name: Levitate
display_help: You can send a single target violently into the air, then slam them to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knock Up

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: This attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
display_target_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your Attack rate.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage.

name: Psionic_Tornado
display_help: Unleashes a whirlwind of Psionic energy on a target, tossing nearby foes into the air. The Psionic Tornado damages foes and Slows their attack speed. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DoT(Psionic), Foe Knockback
display_target_help: You are taking psionic damage over time.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Psionic damage over time.

name: Reveal_Weakness
display_help: The Scryer peers deep into their victim's mind and finds what they are most vulnerable to. Targets affected by this power have their defense and damage resistance reduced for a short time. Recharge: Long
display_target_help: Your Defense and Resistance to damage has been reduced.

name: Subdual
display_help: Subdual deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
display_target_help: You have been Subdued and are being held immobile.

name: Fortitude
display_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single targeted ally's accuracy, damage potential, and defense. The target ally will even take less damage from those few attacks that do hit him. Fortitude even protects the target ally from psionic attacks and damage.
display_target_help: Fortitude immensely enhances a single targeted ally's accuracy, damage potential, and defense. The target ally will even take less damage from those few attacks that do hit him. Fortitude even protects the target ally from psionic attacks and damage.
display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your To Hit, Damage and Defense.

name: Fortune
display_help: Seekers are Seers that specialize in reading the thousands of possible futures and finding the ones that are most likely. By being able to do this, they are able to predict their enemies' actions with relative ease. While this power is active, the user and all nearby allies will receive a bonus To Hit as well as resistance to status effects.
display_target_help: Seekers are Seers that specialize in reading the thousands of possible futures and finding the ones that are most likely. By being able to do this, they are able to predict their enemies' actions with relative ease. While this power is active, the user and all nearby allies will receive a bonus To Hit as well as resistance to status effects.

name: Resistance
display_help: Seers are able to predict their foes' incoming attacks granting them a minor defense buff, and are quite resistant to psychic damage.
